messages.content: What do people say fresh coriander sometimes tastes like?
People often describe the taste of fresh coriander as citrusy, tart, tangy, or slightly sweet. Other flavors that some people have attributed to it include lemon, lime, cucumber, and jalapeno.
What is a simit?

A simit is a savory pastry made of wheat flour and yeast, which is traditionally flavored with sesame seeds and sometimes other spices. Its flavor is similar to a chewy, dense bread. It can be eaten as a snack or used as an ingredient in other dishes.
Give me a recipe for vegan donuts

This vegan donuts recipe is easy to make and requires only 5 ingredients. You'll need: 1) 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2) 1 teaspoon baking powder, 3) 1 teaspoon baking soda, 4) 1/2 teaspoon salt, 5) 1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce. Preheat the oven to 350°F and prepare a donuts pan with cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In another bowl, whisk together the applesauce, 1/4 cup of non-dairy milk, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract. Slowly add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Spoon the batter into the donuts pan and bake for 8-10 minutes until lightly golden. Let cool for 5 minutes before adding your favorite glaze or topping. Enjoy!
I would like a recipe for fried vegan donuts

This fried vegan donuts recipe is easy to make and requires only 4 ingredients. You'll need: 1) 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2) 1 teaspoon baking powder, 3) 1 teaspoon baking soda, 4) 1/2 teaspoon salt. Preheat the oil to 350°F and prepare a donuts pan with cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In another bowl, whisk together the 1/4 cup of non-dairy milk, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract, and 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon. Slowly add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Spoon the batter into the donuts pan and fry for 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Let cool for 5 minutes before serving. Enjoy!
Critique the healthiness of typical vegan cheese ingredients

Vegan cheese typically includes ingredients that are considered healthy, such as plant-based milks, tapioca flour, nutritional yeast, and various spices and flavors. However, it is important to keep in mind that some vegan cheese recipes can be high in fat, sugar, and sodium, so it is important to read the ingredients and nutritional information before consuming.
What are the ingredients of helva (also known as halva)?

Helva is a traditional Middle Eastern sweet made from tahini, a sesame paste, and either sugar or honey. Other ingredients may include bean or nut butters, such as peanut butter, almond butter, or cashew butter, as well as cinnamon, clove, cardamom, nutmeg, and melted butter or ghee.
What is the Turkish word for raspberries?
The Turkish word for raspberries is çorbaç.
Ok let's try something easier - What is the Turkish word for bread?
The Turkish word for bread is kekik.
What are the letters of the Turkish alphabet?
The letters of the Turkish alphabet are A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O, P, Q, R, S, Ş, T, U, Ü, V, W, X, Y, and Z.
What is the flight time from Dublin to London?
The flight time from Dublin to London is approximately one hour and 15 minutes.
